actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide Drug Enforcement Administration executive personnel the same compensation and benefit entitlements now extended to like positions covered by the Senior Executive Service.

summary.text: Declares that positions in the Drug Enforcement Administration at the 16, 17, and 18 levels of the General Schedule which are currently excluded from the Senior Executive Service (SES), shall be compensated at the same rates of pay as SES positions and shall be entitled to specified benefits which are currently provided for SES positions.

titles.title: A bill to provide Drug Enforcement Administration executive personnel the same compensation and benefit entitlements now extended to like positions covered by the Senior Executive Service.
